feature_model.name: FAME-DBMS

meta.data: Feature model of a the FAME-DBMS product line
University of Magdeburg, University of Passau, University of Texas at Austin

Christian Kastner, Sven Apel, Syed Saif ur Rahman, Marko Rosenmuller, Don Batory, and Gunter Saake, On the Impact of the Optional Feature Problem: Analysis and Case Studies, SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA
